# CHANGELOG - mesos_master

## 1.2.0 / 2018-05-11

* [BUGFIX] Add debug logs and a noisier error message.

* [FEATURE] adds gpu metrics. See [#694][]. (Thanks [@ksauzz][])

## 1.0.0 / 2017-03-22

* [FEATURE] adds mesos_master integration.
